name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Giant Island Dungeon
description: The Giant's Island DLC brings exactly that - an island inhabited by stronger enemies! A perfect place to relax in the sun and grind!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Tag Along DLC
description: The Tag Along DLC allows your registered party members to appear in dungeons!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Lily-ad Dungeon
description: The Lily-ad Dungeon DLC allow players to explore Lily Rank specific dungeons and raise their Lily Ranks at a faster rate!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Fairy Fencer F Collaboration
description: This package includes Fairy Fencer F related contents.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Histoire Battle Entry
description: Histoire will join your party!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Additional Content 3
description: This package includes additional new quests and Coliseum battles.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Shares Quests
description: The Shares Quests DLC unlocks four additional quests located in Planeptune, Lastation, Lowee, and Leanbox!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Plutia Battle Entry
description: Plutia will join your party!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Colosseum + Characters DLC
description: The Colosseum + Characters DLC brings three additional characters (Kei Shinguji, Mina Nishizawa, Chika Hakozaki) and new Colosseum-exclusive battles + weapon drops.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Additional Content 1
description: This package includes additional new quests and Coliseum battles

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Uzume Battle Entry
description: The Uzume Battle Entry DLC brings Uzume as a playable character!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Additional Content 2
description: This package includes additional new quests and Coliseum battles.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations: The Ancestors Character Pack
description: The Ancestors Character Pack features four new multiplayer characters, including: the swashbuckling Privateer, the devious siren Corsair, the battle-tested Brigand, and the bloodthirsty Gladiator. Each character is unique, with personalized taunts, weapons, and stylized assassination techniques.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations: Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack
description:
The Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack extends the Assassin’s Creed Revelations multiplayer experience with the addition of six multiplayer maps, each introducing new gameplay opportunities through their varied terrain, perches, and hideouts.

Journey to the majestic holy city of Jerusalem, the opulent Imperial district of Constantinople, and the colorful mercantile district of Dyers. Revisit your favorite Italian Renaissance maps from Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood, starting with the historic city of Firenze (Florence), traveling to the mountainsides of San Donato, and to nighttime Siena with its carnival lights, talented performers, and deadly hiding spots.

This all-new downloadable content also comes with a new collection of Achievements and Trophies for those that want to try their hand at kills and escapes that are as impressive as they are effective.

Give all your multiplayer characters some personal style with bonus multiplayer customization items, also included in the pack.

name: Another road
description: This is an epic humorous adventure. You play as crazy men in underpants who ride a disgusting cart and try to deliver goods. COOL, YEAH?

name: Vanishing Realms: The Sundered Rift
description: Complete the epic adventure in this all-new expansion for Vanishing Realms! Explore new lands, master new weapons, assemble a relic of mighty arcane power and battle a host of new foes while you forge a hero's path to the heart of The Sundered Rift.

name: The Settlers 7: Paths to a Kingdom - Uncharted Land Map Pack
description: Introducing the first DLC package for The Settlers 7: Paths to a Kingdom! The first DLC pack consists of a map pack with 3 maps: Battle of Tanholm: On this two-player map, it is up to you to reunite the divided Metropolis of Tanholm and bring it back to its former glory.

name: Football Betting
description: This game is to let everyone understand the basic process of football betting, and at the same time warn everyone of the risk about gambling through this game.

name: It's Mealtime!
description: It’s Mealtime! is a multiplayer physics game where teams of 4 players work together to manage a restaurant, even if that means having to fight against another team!

name: Karate Krab: Red Sea
description: The sea has changed! Challenge levels that will test all of KK's karate moves.

name: Unbound
description: Unbound Early Access is the beginning of a new way to create and play with friends. Enjoy this first experience designed for VR and stay tuned for more!

name: MonsterTerritory
description: MonsterTerritory is a click adventure game. Explore this world. Collect resources and loots.. Eat food to restore attributes. Build equipment to enhance capabilities. Fight different kinds of monsters and kill bosses！

name: Frag
description: Frag is a roguelike gridless turn-based game of tactical combat that takes place in the near future. Kill the enemy. Grab the loot. Craft new gear. Level up your team. Learn new skills. If you lose a single match, you are done. How long can you survive?

name: Dark Dealings
description: The only way to rise to the top in this world is the hard way, so get on your bike and get to work!

name: StopSign
description: Tower defense, 24 characters, 50 + spells, challenge your level of operation and strategy.

name: Reek N' Havok
description: A sandbox, strategy PC game where you control Reek and Havok; two devlish creatures that aim to destabilize a town through chaos and destruction.

name: Torins Towers: Rise of Heroes
description:
Torins Towers is a thrilling, free-to-play Action Strategy Game RTS, offering fast-paced multiplayer matches and a rich campaign of 80 singleplayer levels.
Unlike traditional strategy games, your army is your most crucial resource here, serving multiple purposes - from building and upgrading to direct engagement in attacks.

name: Constellations: Beyond the Edges
description: After an accident at a space station, you lose all communication with the earth and are no longer able to locate yourself in space, your best chance of returning is to use the space monitoring system to identify known constellations and configure the route back home.

name: Realm of Heroes
description: Realm of Heroes is a strategy game in which players build castles to defend their lands and recruit heroes to fight for their cause.

name: Calculator and Monsters
description: Are you bored with your normal calculator?? Grab this calculator for fun and a secret mission. Calculator and Monsters is calculator where you can raise your monster secretly. Behind the this special calculator there are calculator monsters, a dangerous species. Your mission is to grow them and when they reach Lv5, release them. You can also feed them and train them with mini games.

name: Tormentor
description: Take on the role of a merciless torturer. Earn money from video transmissions of your torments and then buy new victims and torture tools to expand your prison.

name: Rush!!!
description: RUSH!!! is an action-packed, nostalgic pixel precision platformer. Manipulate your environment and gravity to flip your world upside-down, and conquer levels by capturing the flag. Ready to test your precision pixel skills?

name: Push Box
description: More than 132 levels designed each with an answer in this game, wishing for better ideas of yours.

name: Trekking and Camping
description: Trekking and Camping is a climbing-themed walking simulation game that tells the daily adventures of the protagonist named Allen.

name: Deep Night Detective: Chapter One
description: Deep Night Detective, the monochromatic mystery metroidvania! Created by Wilson Taylor with music by Lewmoth!

name: Blind Quest: The Frost Demon
description: Blind Quest - The Frost Demon is a stand-alone adventure with 70 new maps in 7 different scenarios to explore and interact with! Fight new monsters and try to slay Killyus the Frost Demon. An adventure audiogame for real adventurers! Explore and fight in the magical world of Blind Quest 2!

name: Salubrious Scales
description: Salubrious Scales is a sexy, adult's only, platforming/rythm game where you shake your scales as you make your way through an island.

name: Haste
description: Not your average card game... Haste is not a Roguelite, no Card Packs and no... turns?! Haste is a Strategic Card Game played in Real Time. Simply choose 3 heroes and launch into battle. With an ever-changing board, you have to think quick to make meaningful decisions!

name: Mystery
description: Darkness and silence. Then a beep that precedes the opening of the cell in the isolation ward. A bright light turns on in the camera. You are again being taken for questioning about the disappearance of a group of young guys. The story is full of secrets and only you can put all the dots.

name: The Legend of Eratus: Dragonlord
description: In this heroic match-3 game you have to help Aurora and her dragon Eratus in their fight to overthrow the evil Queen and restore peace to the land.

name: Kill the Humans
description: Heavily armed homicidal robots have taken over Weapons Laboratory Delta Five. Something sinister is afoot in the dimly lit corridors of the science complex. Your mission: commandeer the last functional X-4 battle mech, breach the magnetically shielded entrance and wipe them out!

name: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow
description: In this puzzle platformer, you will embark on a touching journey through the surreal world of a person's mind as a young Griffin and his faithful bear, Birly. Overcome challenges, avoid traps and defeat enemies to help the man find peace.

name: Stonks-9800: Stock Market Simulator
description: A simulator of a businessman on the Japanese stock market in the 80s and 90s. Chill, catch a retro vibe, and watch your profits grow in the text-based game STONKS-9800.

name: Depth Hunter 2: Treasure Hunter
description: Depth Hunter 2: Treasure Hunter offers 4 new amazing locations. You will get new equipment - liftbags that will help you lift objects underwater. Your character will be able to find a sunken helicopter, collect more new amazing treasures and finally solve the quest of the Kraken!

name: Depth Hunter 2: Ocean Mysteries
description: Depth Hunter 2: Ocean Mysteries offers two new locations and new equipment. The Thistlegorm wreck and ancient city are waiting for you!

name: Depth Hunter 2: Scuba Kids - Hidden Treasures
description: Dive to the bottom of the sea and find various hidden items in this hidden-object game. 20+ sea creatures, 10 locations, 3 game modes, special items and amazing 3D graphics. Easy and funny game for kids!

name: Cave Shooter
description: Cave Shooter is a popular idle shooting game where you just have fun shooting and running all day long! Warriors, it's time to take up arms against the evil tribe for your homeland! An adventurous journey that marks your victory awaits in the primitive era!

name: Scholastic Brain Play: Preschool - 1st Grade
description:
4 CD-ROMs and Workbook

Essential Learning Skills

Brain-Building Activities for Growing Minds

- Early Math: Dragon Tales Learn & Fly with Dragons -
Dragon Tales builds math skills by helping young dragons earn their badges with early math concepts. Covers counting, number recognition, addition, spatial relationships, shapes & sizes.

- Early Reading: Clifford Phonics -
Clifford Phonics develops important learning skills as you join Clifford and friends at the Birdwell Island Carnival! Teaches letter & sound recognition, word families, sight words, spelling and sentence structure.

- Logic: I Spy Junior -
I Spy Junior helps children practice thinking skills while playing unique riddles, puzzles and games. Covers problem solving, visual discrimination, memory, cause and effect, classification & sorting.

- Typing: Disney's Adventures In Typing with Timon and Pumbaa -
Disney's Adventures In Typing with Timon and Pumbaa features 15 fun-filled lessons that improve keyboard accuracy and typing speed. Teaches finger placement, home row technique, letter recognition, accuracy and speed.

name: Disney's Adventures in Typing with Timon & Pumbaa
description:
Rafiki, Timon and Pumbaa from Disney's Lion King are the tutors in this typing game created for children ages 6 and up. The comedic meerkat and warthog team are "going off on an adventure to broaden their horizons", and wise old Rafiki advises them to bring along his keyboard. When they demur, Rafiki enjoins the player to assist them in their travels, and the typing tutorial begins.

The game employs standard practice routines, beginning with proper posture and placement of the fingers on the keys, followed by letter repetitions as each section of the keyboard is mastered. At first the exercises focus on accuracy, later working up to increasing the player's typing speed. Keyboard exercises are interspersed with mini typing games that become available as the player progresses:

Milestones are rewarded with printable certificates, and Rafiki keeps a progress report of the player's WPM (words per minute) and accuracy statistics, as well as showing which keys the player needs to work on. There is a Ctrl + P option at the sign-in page that allows the unlocking of all the games and lessons.

name: Great Adventures: Castle
description: Woe to the Fisher-Price kingdom! The good King McBeard's castle was taken over by his brother, the evil King Smudge and his Naughty Knights. It is up to you to help McDuff find where the Good Knights have been hiding and convince them to help take back the castle from King Smudge. Players can choose to play a game where they will only have to rescue two of the knights to win or a full game where they must find all six knights to storm the castle. Players must solve a variety of puzzles and challenges before they can save King McBeard. And if you win, the good McDuff will be knighted and join the other Good Knights in the castle. It contains elements of early learning for children including art, creativity, critical thinking, reading comprehension, imagination and role-playing.

name: Maimai DX Universe
description: maimai Deluxe Universe is the third entry of the maimai Deluxe series, successor of the Maimai series. The game is played using touch screen or buttons on a large cabinet with a circular screen.

name: Maimai DX Splash Plus
description: "maimai DX Splash PLUS" is an upgraded version of the arcade music game "maimai DX Splash," which began rolling out on Thursday, March 18, 2021. The new version includes new popular songs, as well as a number of exciting collaborations!

name: Smash Reversi
description: "Reversi" that supports Internet battles is now available on "Nintendo Switch! There are 3 types of play modes. "Solo Play" to play against AI. "Internet Play" to play with people on the net. "Local Play" to play with your friends. There are various stages such as a wide board, a narrow board, and a tricky board with many holes. If you take the "Buster Bomb" placed on the board, you can make all the pieces in the direction of the arrow your own color. Let's play with "Smash Reversi" and get excited together!

name: Idle Inventor: Factory Tycoon
description: Churn out massive machines in your finely-tuned factory - day and night, even while you’re not playing!

name: Taijitu: A Game About Balance
description: Inspired by the Chinese mythology of the Yin and Yang. Taijitu is a puzzle game about balance and harmony. The goal is to interchange shapes colour and make the colour balance on each side. The white line separate each different world by top and bottom or left and right. This puzzle game combine the art of geometry with beautiful transitions and ambient music. Plug in your earphones and enjoy the experience.

name: Can You Escape Modern Office
description: Sin descripción

name: Hypoxia: One Last Breath
description: A breathtaking sci-fi visual novel! Since the Z gas appeared in the atmosphere, it is no longer possible to breath outside the Dome. You play as Carl Thanavan, a young scientist determined to uncover the origin of the catastrophe. Which path will you choose?

name: World of Paranoia
description: WORLD OF PARANOIA is a management game where the player controls a supercomputer that is in charge of governing an utopia.

name: Child of Abyss
description: Child of Abyss is a 2D rougelike strategy card game where you play as the child who is trying bring its beloved dog back from the dead.

name: Super Sketchy Party
description: A drawing guessing party game for at least 3 players. Played with your smartphone and works locally and online combined for the ultimate fun.

name: Survival RPG: The Lost Treasure
description: Survival RPG: The Lost Treasure is a retro RPG game with a survival twist. Let the treasure hunt begin! A journey in a one-of-a-kind adventure that combines exploration, RPG and survival in a 2D pixel art universe is waiting for you.

name: Epsilon wars
description: epsilon wars is a turn based artillery game set in space. players must use the newtonian gravity of suns, planets, and blackholes to guide their torpedoes at enemy ships, space stations, and freighters. challenge yourself in single player and multiplayer (2-4 players).

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Champions Pack
description: The CHAMPIONS pack includes the ATP Cup, 6 additional official players including Andy Murray, Diego Schwartzman and Maria Sharapova, 4 new stadiums in London and Melbourne, and extra official outfits and equipment.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Sofia Kenin & Karolina Pliskova
description: This DLC includes 2 additional female players: Sofia Kenin and Karolína Plíšková.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Legends Pack
description: The Legends pack unlocks 2 players who left their mark on tennis history in the 2000s: Gustavo Kuerten and Marat Safin.

name: Tennis World Tour 2: Official Tournaments and Stadia Pack
description: The OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS and STADIA pack includes the Roland-Garros tournament with the Philippe-Chatrier, Suzanne-Lenglen and Simonne-Mathieu stadiums; the Estadio Manolo Santana, the main court of the Madrid Open; the OWL Arena, the main court of the Halle Open, and the Tie Break Tens tournament.

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 182 Loco Add-On
description: In Train Sim World 2, the DB BR 182 adds a dash of red to the "Rapid Transit" route, and depicts the Mitteldeutschland S-Bahn S2 line during the transitional period where DB BR 1442 EMUs were still being delivered.

name: Immure: Part Two
description: A new door creeks open within the mysterious mansion. As the nightmare continues, Will must investigate a family tragedy. Murder, lies and sorrow fill the air. Uncover the truth and decide the fate of those who remain.

name: Target Practice
description: Touch the floor and you lose! Click on the falling targets and click your abilities to rack up the points. Target Practice is an easy game anyone can play.

name: BallisticNG: Outer Reaches
description: Adding 6 new tracks, a new campaign and a new set of liveries, Outer Reaches has you race around the solar system in the most dangerous races the AGL has seen yet.

name: Demon Keeper 2+
description: This is a turn-based strategy game. You need to command your various monsters and chiefs to fight against humans, grabbing territories and gold resources will allow you to summon more demons to win the battle.

name: Pray Game
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Play as Arcee, a young woman who's home mysteriously gets teleported to an island. Now she works to discover what happened, and find her way back home.

name: Monster Academy
description: There's a school for monsters where they learn how to blend in to the human world. Everyone there is secretly a monster. Apart from one man who is actually a human and must now figure out to safely escape.

name: The Fisherman: Fishing Planet - Blue Crab Island Expansion
description: Welcome to Blue Crab Island! Situated off the Gulf Coast of Mississippi, this picturesque island is an angler's paradise. The canals, local mangrove trees and sawgrass thickets hide plenty of fish, including 8 new species. Make the most out of your trip with an exclusive new bass boat and tackles.

description: Frontiers.io - Expansion Pack 1 This pack contains 16 new Monster, Knights and animal Characters. Unlock them all. Your goal? To conquer as much territory as possible. name: Plagueworld: Expansion Pack
description: A dark challenge await in this new levels filled with traps and secrets.

name: Daughter of Shadows: An SCP Breach Event - Friend and Foe Expansion
description: The Friend and Foe expansion adds eight new SCPs to Daughter of Shadows, as well as a mobile task force that has been dispatched to contain SCP-029. Explore the facility once again to acquire powerful allies while avoiding deadly foes. Included in the list are fan favorites SCP-682 and SCP-079.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Ver 2.0 Expansion Pack
description: Big update Ver 2.0 is now released! Below items are included in this DLC: 9 new characters, new avatars, icons, and VS plates, 4 new colors to choose for all 53 characters, new scenarios in story mode.

name: FortressCraft Evolved!: Frozen Factory
description: Winter Is Here... Go deeper into the underground caverns, challenging the frozen depths as you search for new materials to advance your technology in the first expansion pack for Fortresscraft Evolved. Within the interior of this rugged and unforgiving environment you will find new ores and crystals needed to design advanced weapons,...

name: Domina: Ludus Expansion - Livery
description: Is your Ludus full to the brim? No room for horses and chariots and lions amidst these stinky men? Build a Livery! Massive spacious expansion of the ludus includes roomy training area for horses, chariots, and even those dirty gladiators who you don't like very much. Space for activities!

name: ArcheAge: Unchained - Garden of the Gods
description: Follow in the footsteps of the legendary Library Expedition to explore the origin of Gods.

name: Bridge Constructor Trains: Expansion Pack
description: The "Trains" DLC let's you visit the "Choonited Kingdom" island group, with a total of 18 new levels across three islands.

name: Age of Fear 3: The Blood and Moon Expansion
description: Its thick fur glistening in the moonlight, the great wolf charges through the forest as a hunting party gives chase with torches lit and weapons drawn. Dodging an arrow, the wolf leaps over a fallen tree and tumbles into a wide clearing.

name: Horse Paradise: My Dream Ranch - Mystic Cave & Paradise Cove
description: Explore the secrets of the Mystic Cave and Paradise Cove.

name: Nekojishi Expansion Pack: A Sunny Day
description: Through arrangements made by Yan Shu-Chi, Tiger and Leopard are given a single day to be incarnated and walk the earth as humans. However, Liao still has hang-ups over Shu-Chi’s ability to pull all of this off with his family. Perhaps there is more that has been left unsaid…

name: Blind Postman
description: Help blind postman, who sees only walls, to collect all the letters and to find an exit out of labyrinth.

name: Greed: Abandoned Dogs
description: GREED: Abandoned Dogs is a competitive “PvEvP” Third-Person Shooter. Travel back in time to ancient civilizations where your sole goal is to survive, loot treasures and escape. Be the last one standing to sell stolen relics and become rich.

name: The Termination
description: It's a story of deception and redemption. You receive a mysterious invitation to a seven days doomsday journey. An expectant interstellar journey has become a doomsday route to the end. There is only one word difference between "victim" and "perpetrator".

name: Conflict of Heroes: Storms of Steel
description: Storms of Steel is set in the Battle of Kursk and brings an impressive new campaign, created in part by legendary wargame designer John Hill, to Conflict of Heroes. Storms of Steel adds rules for airplanes, snipers, and over fifty new units.

name: 捕鱼炸翻天
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Drift
description: Feel the taste of arcade drift. Be the first on the leaderboard!

name: Cubo ao Topo
description: "Cubo ao topo" is a strategy game played in the Twitch channel chat.

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Annie
description: Fiercer than she looks, bravest in the cosmos, she is ANNIE OF THE STARS! This DLC includes Annie, her new stage, 29 palettes, character tutorials/trials, and full Story Mode!

name: ChronoTecture: The Eprologue
description: ChronoTecture: The Eprologue is an indie FPS adventure game created by an architectural designer. Discover a surreal world and story about Cats, Time-Travel, Life, Death, and Dreams. Featuring gameplay with futuristic archery, time-control, exploration, and platforming.

name: Wesprau Senki
description: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Yuwaka. Reclaim your village engulfed by war in this traditional fantasy RPG.

name: Typing Fingers
description: Meet Dennis your new instructor that will teach you how to touch-type correctly and efficiently on the keyboard in a fun way with beautiful design and music. Each of the 32 levels is divided into 3 phases: Learn, Play, and Test, which will help you to practice enough to develop your typing skills.

name: Corpse Mansion
description: An indie action survival horror game! Explore a vast open pixel art world where your decisions shape the flow of the story and ultimately the ending too.

name: Trailer Shop Simulator
description: Being on the run from the mafia for more than 10 years, you managed to hide for a while in a cozy sunny town. Develop, buy weapons, engage in all available types of business to eventually protect yourself from a large criminal organization.

name: I Deserve a Happy Ending
description: Play as a prince as he attempts to give his story a happy ending by finding love and claiming his place as the rightful heir of the throne in this fantasy Boys' Love visual novel.
